page.title: 13Keeping it neat and tidy.
page.content: At the end of Pytches Road are the council offices. My dad goes there occasionally,to meetings with council officials.My dad is a council worker and is employed by Suffolk Coastal District Council.He works at the Woodbrige depot with many other people who also work for the council.His work involves digging, hoeing, planting seeds, cutting the grass and pricking out seedlings for the parks around Woodbridge.I think the borders that they dig and hoe look very attractive when they have finished working there.My dad and the other men with him don't just work in Woodbridge, they work at other places as well - Leiston, Ufford, and even as far as Felixstowe. In the summer the public borders look beautiful and many visitors admire them. {County Primary.}
